body: At 3rd level, as long as the musket master has 1 grit point, she can reload any two-handed firearm as if it were a one-handed firearm. This deed replaces the utility shot deed.
name: Fast Musket
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Gunslinger/Gunslinger Archetypes/Musket Master/Deeds/Fast Musket
